column4: Damnit! I just hit an apt-get update. The first two servers it checked were non-Canonical/Ubuntu repositories. I saw things working and almost jumped out of my chair :(
How much space is required to set up a full, local universe/multiverse/main/restricted repository for the release, security, backports, and updates?
Hm... may just have to contribute a drive to the campus unix box, then :) thanks :)
